ToolBarArea Class Reference

An alterantive to ToolBarFrame which can contain an ExpandingToolBar. ToolBarArea is used for a 'docked' ToolBar, ToolBarFrame for a floating one. More...

Detailed Description

An alterantive to ToolBarFrame which can contain an ExpandingToolBar. ToolBarArea is used for a 'docked' ToolBar, ToolBarFrame for a floating one.
